rate_limit.title: Too Many Requests
rate_limit.description: You're making requests too quickly. Please wait a moment and try again.
rate_limit.auth_description: Too many authentication attempts. Please wait before trying again.
rate_limit.api_description: You've exceeded the API request limit. Please wait before making more requests.
rate_limit.critical_description: Too many security-related requests. Please wait before trying again.
